channel.title: Biozeminade Speculation Thread
channel.description:
Just what were the mysteriously oft-hinted at, yet oh-so good looking Biozeminades? If you have any information, please post here! What did they look like? (Artist concepts a must.) What were their attacks like? And just why were they cut? Please help unravel this age-old riddle!
Here's what we know so far:
The Biozeminades was a enemy in HL2 that was cut after the hack. The Biozeminades had the power to make itself look good and you had to kill it with spray paint.
Testimony: "...it has a few new enemies named 'biozeminades' which can make themselves look good, and you have to kill them with spray paint... i hope that the biozeminades are as good as people say they are."

item.title: Biozeminade Speculation Thread
item.dc:creator: Krazor
item.description:
And already this thead is full of buzzkill. I guess I’m going to have to spell it out…

[COLOR=‘Black’]Make shit up. It’s supposed to be bs. It’s all based on some indecipherable “review” someone wrote of a HL2 strategy guide. I thought we could have some fun with it.

Read full topic

item.title: Biozeminade Speculation Thread
item.dc:creator: Medevilae
item.description:
Winged One:

Er

Excuse me?

His post is rather confusing, but it was an enemy that could make itself look like a friendly, and you had to discern whether or not to kill it.

Just from hearing about the idea you can tell it’s BS.

Read full topic

item.title: Biozeminade Speculation Thread
item.dc:creator: Medevilae
item.description:
They never existed. They were referred to/created in a player review of the leak waaayyyy back in 03.
